mapper.select: select count(*) from myintake where intake_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and id=#{id}
select * from myintake where id=#{id} and code=#{code}
select * from myintake where intake_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and id=#{id} limit #{page},10
mapper.delete: delete from myintake where id=#{id} and code=#{code} and intake_date=#{intakeDate}
